About Me

I am Srilekha Senthilkumar

I am a passionate DevOps Engineer with 3.5 years of experience transforming complex processes into streamlined, automated solutions. My expertise lies in building scalable infrastructure, optimizing CI/CD pipelines, and driving efficiency across cloud environments. I thrive in fast-paced environments where I can leverage my skills in automation, containerization, and orchestration to deliver robust, reliable systems. With a keen eye for detail and a commitment to continuous improvement, I am dedicated to bridging the gap between development and operations to accelerate innovation and drive success.
